name(Charger's Workshop)

snap(-16,-16,-16)
sky(196,191,255)
fog(192,187,229)
ground(169,165,202)
polys(50,14,240)
fadefrom(5000)
density(7)
nlaps(6)
lightson()


set(47,0,0,0)p
